post.text: Join me LIVE in St. Augustine, FL!

comment.author: James
comment.text: Love all the Deplorables here !!!!! I'm a proud Minnesota one !!!!!

replies.author: James
replies.text: Jason it's fun chatting with and hearing what good people have to say about topics

replies.author: Jason
replies.text: Wish he would come to Minnesota. I think he would find that this state is not as blue as everyone thinks.

replies.author: James
replies.text: I agree with that. But look at what happened in Minneapolis but all the same I agree with you
